EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_TrackerTrainings_Q314.Invite - LA Nov. 20, 2014 (reminder to register
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Register for Pivotal Tracker Training Session in LA - Nov. 20
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, There's still time for you and a member of your team to register for Pivotal Tracker's exclusive Training Session on November 20 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at our Los Angeles office. We’ll walk through Pivotal Tracker’s capabilities in the new UI. The session is geared towards newer Tracker users, but we'll share a few advanced tips and tricks as well. Most importantly, we want to hear from you and we'll have experts on-hand to answer all of your Tracker and project management questions. Seating is limited to the first 12 registrants. Event details are below.
Pivotal Tracker Training Session Date: Thursday, Nov. 20, 2014 Time: 11 a.m. - 1 p.m. (lunch will be provided) Location: 631 Wilshire Blvd, Santa Monica, CA Cost: Invite-only, free to attend. Reply to this email to RSVP. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. We look forward to hosting you for this special event! Regards, Charles Charles Springer Pivotal Tracker
